parameters: \ts[3]"No, you're... You're not a human of the temple."
\.Why do you keep interfering with the tower's attack?"
\ts[3]"I don't know. Because I forgot who I am."
\ts[3]"But I know... The purpose of the temple is not attack the tower.."
\ts[3]"They're... rather preventing the tower from attacking.."
\ts[3]"Look, before you forget who you are..."
